page.title: 11LEISURE
page.content: others were evacuated during the war. Most people said that they spent their leisure time locally but went away for their holidays.Walking and watersports were popular pastimes and as many of the houses have large gardens many people spent their time tending them. Most people felt that there was little for teenagers in the village but that other age groups were well catered for with Toddlers groups, playschemes,guides and Scouts, Youth Clubs and Venture Scouts for young people and Good Companions, Day Centres and St. John's Ambulance courses for older people.
